text: mariyu atanini konna ijiptu (misr) vasi tana bharyato annadu: "Itanini gauravanga uncuko! Bahusa itanu manaku labhadayakudu kavaccu! Leda manam itanini kodukuga cesukovaccu!" Mariyu i vidhanga memu yusuph nu bhumipai sthanamicci ataniki sanghanala gudharthanni (svapnala bhavanni) teliyajese (vidyanu) nerpamu. Allah tana karyanni purti ceyagala sakti kaligi unnadu, kani cala mandiki idi teliyadu
